title: Forever Forgiven
description:
Mayday! Mayday! Prepare to eject…
Sutton ‘Firefly’ Grainger wore a mask over his emotions, pretending to be something he wasn’t – strong and brave. Growing up alone, coping with guilt from his past, and then the death of his friend? It was all too much. The trauma, panic attacks, and mental chaos were more than he could bear silently anymore… but he also wasn’t alone in his fight.
We’ve got a man down…
Melody Greene never thought her husband would come home in a casket. Pregnant, alone, and trying to figure out how to move on? An unexpected letter from Jordan’s fellow airman was just what she needed. Sharing memories, building a friendship, and realizing it was okay to grieve, was helping her so much… until they met.A single unexpected kiss brought her fragile peace to an abrupt halt, creating so many other problems for the two of them… or was it the start of a second chance at something wonderful?***Flyboys are a group of men who thrive on adrenaline, toy with playboy reputations, and are a bunch of self-proclaimed misfits. This sweet, romantic series is full of soaring emotions, sweeping intense moments, and loyal friendships that unite the most unlikely characters into an unforgettable love story.
author: Ginny Sterling
